articles.description: Khloe Kardashian appeared to get some early Valentine's Day love from Tristan Thompson, when she tagged her partner and baby daddy in pre-holiday post on Friday.

articles.description: She's currently embroiled in a divorce from her estranged husband and father of her two children. But Kelly Clarkson chose to concentrate on the positive on Friday.
